Flappy Game Template

Heavily inspired by the mobile game Flappy Bird, this template shows how to create a complete game for both mobile and desktop for osu!framework.

Usage

Open FlappyDon.sln in Visual Studio or Rider.

Attributions

  • Flappy Bird artwork by Matthias Gall.
  • Number sprites by ahmadmanga, available on opengameart.org.
  • Arcade font by Jakob Fischer.
  • Remaining artwork + sounds are from osu! resources.
